p: From 136 approved drugs against cancer during 1981â€“2014, only 17% were of synthetic origin while 83% of these drugs were derived from natural compounds or based on natural scaffolds ( Demain and Vaishnav, 2011). Several natural compounds such as taxols, brassinosteroids and polyphenols possess high efficacy to fight various cancers ( Greenwell and Rahman, 2015). Polyphenols are significantly abundant in dietary foods and their contribution in the prevention of cardiovascular diseases and cancer is emerging now a days ( Manach et al., 2004).
